title: NFL Monday Night Football average viewers 2015 to 2019
summary: Overall Viewers in millions has increased over the Year.
Viewers in millions is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Viewers in millions, about 12.6 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Viewers in millions, of value 11.6 was reported at Year 2018
